TopicTitle: Attachment nodes subassemblies disappear when I load them

Articles.Content:
Hi there!

So I was making a trivial rover, builded a fairing and heat shield around it in the SPH, and saved it as a Subassembly to be loaded in the VAB in order to attach it to a lifter. Nothing out of the ordinary, at least in versions prior to 1.0 this method worked flawlessly. But now, in v1.0 the Attachment nodes disappear as soon as I load the subassembly in the VAB. Than I thought, maybe I forgot a (stack)decoupler beneath the heat shield, I added that part, and saved it as a subassembly. Still, same results, no attachments nodes... Am I doing something wrong all of a sudden, or is this a problem more of you guys experience? :-)

Kind regards,

Tim

We'll need to see the craft, and a craft file would help as well, you can put the files on imgur and dropbox.

It's possible you did not leave an open node to allow attachment, it's easily done and a re-root with the F4 tool should solve it.

(Press F4, click craft, click again to select new root part)
